text: "Have You Ever Seen the Rain?" is a 1970 song by Creedence Clearwater Revival and taken from their sixth studio album Pendulum. It went to number 1 in Canada, Malaysia and South Africa, number 6 in New Zealand and Norway, number 5 in Singapore, number 6 in Australia, Austria and Belgium and number 8 in Brazil, Sweden and the United States. == References == Category:1970 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Country rock songs Category:Creedence Clearwater Revival songs Category:Bonnie Tyler songs Category:Rod Stewart songs Category:Willie Nelson songs Category:Joan Jett and The Blackhearts songs Category:The Ramones songs Category:Boney M. songs
title: Have You Ever Seen the Rain?
